summary: This is an email from an official at the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY) following up on a previous conversation about identifying the appropriate contact person for a grand jury request related to the Epstein case. The sender is seeking clarification on whether the contact should be in the Middle District of Florida (MD Fl) or the Northern District of Georgia (ND Ga).
locations: United States Attorney's Office, SDNY (Southern District of New York)
keyFacts: The document is an email dated April 17, 2019, concerning a grand jury request related to the Epstein case.
The communication is between officials at the U.S. Attorney's Office, specifically from the Southern District of New York (SDNY).
The email seeks to identify the appropriate contact for the grand jury request, with potential jurisdictions being the Middle District of Florida or the Northern District of Georgia.
The correspondence indicates ongoing inter-district coordination within the Department of Justice regarding the Epstein investigation in 2019.
